head.title: Female Teacher Accused Of Affair With Boy, 15

hedline.hl1: Female Teacher Accused Of Affair With Boy, 15

abstract.p: Nichole Matarese, 29-year-old English teacher at Canarsie High School, is arrested and accused of having sexual relationship with 15-year-old boy in ninth grade (S)

block.p: A 29-year-old English teacher at Canarsie High School was arrested Wednesday night and accused of having a sexual relationship with a 15-year-old boy in the ninth grade, officials said yesterday.

The teacher, Nichole Matarese, was charged with endangering the welfare of a child, said Edward F. Stancik, the special investigator for schools. Ms. Matarese and the boy met at her Staten Island home several times, Mr. Stancik said.
A 29-year-old English teacher at Canarsie High School was arrested Wednesday night and accused of having a sexual relationship with a 15-year-old boy in the ninth grade, officials said yesterday.

The teacher, Nichole Matarese, was charged with endangering the welfare of a child, said Edward F. Stancik, the special investigator for schools. Ms. Matarese and the boy met at her Staten Island home several times, Mr. Stancik said.
Ms. Matarese met the boy when she was his teacher, said a spokeswoman for the Staten Island district attorney's office.

Pam McDonnell, a spokeswoman for the Board of Education, said the board had begun the process to fire Ms. Matarese. An order of protection has been issued to prevent her from seeing the boy. METRO NEWS BRIEFS: NEW YORK
